metadata.title: CVE-2015-1283 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in the XML_GetBuffer function in Expat through2.1.0, as used in Google Chrome before 44.0.2403.89 and other products,allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based bufferoverflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted XML data, arelated issue to CVE-2015-2716.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095
chromium-browser-l10n - 44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095
chromium-chromedriver - 44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095
No subscription required

liboxideqt-qmlplugin - 1.8.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
liboxideqtcore0 - 1.8.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
oxideqmlscene - 1.8.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

expat - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.1
lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.1
libexpat1 - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

vnc4server - 4.1.1+xorg4.3.0-37ubuntu5.0.2+esm1
xvnc4viewer - 4.1.1+xorg4.3.0-37ubuntu5.0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '44.0.2403.89-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1095').
oxide-qt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
expat package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-4ubuntu1.1').
xmlrpc-c package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
vnc4 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.1+xorg4.3.0-37ubuntu5.0.2+esm1').
swish-e: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
insighttoolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

coin3 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
